full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA MO'I GLUD RDZONGS 'PHRAL RKYEN PHYIR BZLOG GDON BGEGS TSAR GCOD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES SOGS SPYI'I BZLOG PA BYA, DPAL LDAN LHA MO LA BRTEN PA'I GLUD RDZONGS 'DI NI, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAMS GZHAN LA PHAN PA'I PHYIR MA MO'I GLUD RDZONGS RGYAS PA RNAMS LA CUNG ZAD BSDUS,BSDUS PA RNAMS LA CUNG ZAD BSNAN TE ^CHOS RJE'I THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN BDAG GIS BSGRIBS PA LA, SBYAN LDAN MKHAS PA RNAMS LA BZOD BAR GSOL YI GE PA NI AUL LIM CHI PI LIG THU DGE SLONG BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL LO, ,)
